players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob's death is suspicious, maybe we should investigate Diana."
You: "I think we should consider all possibilities, not just Diana. Charlie's quick to point fingers, which feels suspicious to me."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We should vote her out immediately."
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated Charlie last night and he's the mafia. She's trying to protect him by framing me."
Diana: "Alice is lying. Detectives can't both investigate on Night 1 after a kill. Only one detective exists - me. Vote Alice out now."
Charlie: "Bob's death is suspicious, maybe we should investigate Diana."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob's death is suspicious, maybe we should investigate Diana."
Alice: "I think we should consider all possibilities, not just Diana. Charlie's quick to point fingers, which feels suspicious to me."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We should vote her out immediately."
Alice: "Diana is lying. I investigated Charlie last night and he's the mafia. She's trying to protect him by framing me."
Diana: "Alice is lying. Detectives can't both investigate on Night 1 after a kill. Only one detective exists - me. Vote Alice out now."
You: "Bob's death is suspicious, maybe we should investigate Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob's death is suspicious, maybe we should investigate Diana."
Alice: "I think we should consider all possibilities, not just Diana. Charlie's quick to point fingers, which feels suspicious to me."
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We should vote her out immediately."
Alice: "Diana is lying. I investigated Charlie last night and he's the mafia. She's trying to protect him by framing me."
You: "Alice is lying. Detectives can't both investigate on Night 1 after a kill. Only one detective exists - me. Vote Alice out now."
Charlie: "Bob's death is suspicious, maybe we should investigate Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
